name: Magic Dice Forest
description:
!!if you want to play this game on the web, please click full screen!!

This is a Mini-Adventure Game for GMTK 2022. 

Theme - Roll of the dice

How do we interpret "Roll of a dice"? 

When a player attacks, the player's attack and defense in a turn are determined by a roll of the dice. Also, during the play, players can upgrade their dice sides to gain stronger abilities.

————————————————————————————————————————

Game Description: 

This is a Mini-Adventure Game. Players need to get the strong power of magic dice to defeat the dragon. 

Control System: 

Mouse Left Click to press button. 

MLC to click, hold, and drag to the opposite side to move the avatar

Gameplay: 

Player need to click, hold, and drag the avatar to the opposite way to move. In the magic forest, there are dangerous monsters and treasure boxes. 

Players can gain stronger dice abilities by defeating monsters. Treasure chests will also provide stronger abilities and special abilities. Players touch the wall will bounce, so in some special terrain, players need to be very careful to pass.

The player does not regain health point during the entire game. So, please be careful! If you think you don't have enough HP to defeat the dragon, avoid fighting with some powerful Monsters.

If you defeat the dragon, you win! 

————————————————————————————————————————
